name: Funky Barn It's Farming!
description:
Grab your Wii U GamePad and create a beautiful farmland full of animals,
crops, trees and more…then develop it into the craziest, most offbeat
farm imaginable, overflowing with the whackiest contraptions and
goofiest gizmos you and your animals have ever seen!

Features

• Use the GamePad in all-new ways! - Touch, tilt , shake, speak to
control your farm
• Get Hands-on with your Animals! - from a tiny
chick to a giant buffalo, gently stroke the feathers or fur, then watch
the delighted responses
• Create and Play – Your Way! - Purchase
hilariously offbeat farm equipment and cultivate a vibrant paradise as
you get hands-on with the farm YOU want to create
• Strategies For
Success - Spend your money wisely, nuture your flock and trade with
neighbours to manage your farm wisely
